name: concurrency

scripts.grant-statistics: psql --dbname "host=localhost port=5432 user=postgres password=password123 dbname=postgres" -c "GRANT pg_read_all_stats TO username;"
scripts.watch: psql --dbname "host=localhost port=5432 user=username password=password123 dbname=postgres" -f watch.sql

description: Show how concurrency can be handled on database client
